headerDescription: Koios offers a various amount of assignments that student’s can participate in. Each assignment gives the students a different compensation. Select a track below that fit’s you to see the available assignments
title: Assignments
description: Koios offers various tracks and assignments submitted by ecosystem partners. Each project allows the learner to scale their ability and earn different compensations. So please select a track below that matches your interest, join one of the assignments, and reap the rewards!

assignments.title: Bring your own idea
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Build your blockchain dream! Within the Koios team and/or in collaboration with network partners, we have resources available to support you in executing your very own idea. If the concept aligns with Koios, you can ask us for time like guidance or specific skills, funds, hardware access, software access, etc. If it does not align with our own activities, no problem, but access to resources will be more limited. Dare to dream & dare to ask. Contact us via the assignment link or find us in the Discord.
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

type.typeItem: Individual or group assignment for study credits & Titan Tokens
Internship for study credits & Titan Tokens
Thesis opportunity for study credits & Titan Tokens

assignments.title: Donation webshop
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description:
Help us stream value to there where it matters. The Koios DAO, as well as the platform users, will earn different rewards. Some of them can be monetary by nature. We would like to facilitate the possibility of donating these rewards. We are in phase Zero. Everything needs to be built up from the ground. Possible activities: 
Design and set up the processes 
Find suited charities, projects (that accept cryptocurrency & are approved by our community) 
Design and/or build the front page with charities overview
Design the incentive mechanisms (donators receive badge xxx, or …., or ….)
Other (we are open to ideas!)
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

type.typeItem: Individual or group assignment for study credits & Titan Tokens
An internship for study credits & Titan Tokens
A thesis opportunity for study credits & Titan Tokens
A paid micro-challenge (bounty rewards)

assignments.title: Front end developer
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description:
Show the world what you got and help expand & improve the decentralized learning dream. 
As you might have noticed, there is a lot to be done on the front-end of Koios; 404 pages, work from the action list with improvement suggestions, or perhaps your very own ideas. Select a very minor element or help in a more extensive task at hand. Everything is possible on the open-source platform. Join our team and secure your spot after the minor. Build up your web3 experience and resume in an open-source fashion (via Github). Front-end is built in React. In connection with the back end, you will encounter JavaScript and blockchain gimmicks.
assignments.skillSet: Language skills: React. JavaScript would be a plus
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

type.typeItem: Individual or group assignment for study credits & Titan Tokens
An internship for study credits & Titan Tokens
A thesis opportunity for study credits & Titan Tokens
A paid micro-challenge (bounty rewards)
A paid side-job
A paid full-time job
Other (surprise us & contact us)

assignments.title: Back end developer
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Show the world what you got and help expand & improve the decentralized learning dream. This assignment is all about developing and improving the back-end of Koios. We tie the platform to all kinds of web2 applications (Discord, CMS, Twitter, etc.). And web3 applications (blockchains, tokens/contracts, defi tools, dao tools, tools from partners). You could work from our action list or bring your very own ideas to the table. Everything is possible on the open-source platform. So join our team & secure your spot after the minor.

assignments.title: The hardware lab
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Hardware, hardware, hardware. If you are all about hardware, this is your chance. Explore the blockchain realm, select your favorite project, tools, etc., and start experimenting. Make an educational clip about it, or align in some other way with the Koios platform. We can talk about allocating some of our resources (cover costs, etc.). You could also work from our hit list or expand one of your own ideas. We’ve had digital bartenders, a lightning ATM, mining rigs, and even a token game arcade! The sky is the limit.
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

type.typeItem: Individual or group assignment for study credits & Titan Tokens
An internship for study credits & Titan Tokens
A thesis opportunity for study credits & Titan Tokens

assignments.title: Hardware setups for koios dao
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: To realize the decentralized dream with free learning for all, the Koios DAO needs to become self-sustainable. One way to possibly learn this is to mine and mint cryptocurrencies from (partner) protocols. The assignment is to search & select the suitable protocols and help us validate the software. Join our team & resources, and go wild! You could also work from our hit list or expand one of your own ideas. We’ve had all kinds of PoW or PoS protocols and are running some protocols now.

A paid micro-challenge (bounty rewards)

assignments.title: Visual designer
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Do your hands start to itch when you see the current Koios design (or slack in places where you would love to go all out). We need help with new or improved visual designs for the Koios web pages and content. Think website images, token & badges design, NFT’s, storyline visualizations, images for in the curriculum. You can bring your own ideas, style, and vision to the table. Show the world what you got!

assignments.title: UX designer
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: You are currently experiencing V0.1 of Koios world, so there are still infinite possibilities. Help us improve the user experience in this adventure. You could work with the team from our hitlist, feedback from users, or tap from your own experiences and vision. Help us help people learn and build a genuinely incredible web2 and web3 experience.

assignments.title: Token engineer Koios Tokens
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: This job is all about tokens, focusing on the different Koios Tokens we will be using. Help us set up the token framework (which tokens for what purposes), the first incentive mechanisms, real-life use cases, the design (technical or visual), the metrics & possibly the launch. Or explore the crypto space and find new ideas or partners to incorporate/work within the token constellation. You will work with a team of token designers and will have a specific task of your choosing.
assignments.skillSet: Basic knowledge of cryptocurrencies is preferred.
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

A thesis opportunity for study credits & Titan Tokens

assignments.title: General DAO research
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: The Koios DAO is a newbie in the DAO space. We are in the orientation phase and taking our first baby steps as a DAO. We need help, a lot of information and good DAO examples are out there. This assignment is researching the DAO space and the different components (which you can select). Think voting processes, the tools to use, community engagement, mechanics. All ideas to expand on decentralization are welcome!
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

type.typeItem: Individual or group assignment for study credits & Titan Tokens
An internship for study credits & Titan Tokens
A thesis opportunity for study credits & Titan Tokens

assignments.title: Deep Dive Koios DAO Research
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: The Koios token has launched. It is time to start experimenting with it. Think incentives, in- en outflows, distributions and token mechanics, use-cases, python calculation. Select a topic of your liking and help us build the self-sustainable model. This assignment also heavily focusses on the research part: what examples & solutions for engagement can you find out there in the cryptocurrency space.

assignments.title: Minor team assistance
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description:
Grow into the next student assistant! 
We are looking for assistance on several activities. It could be supporting (one of) the projects, help out with the curriculum, in the community, etc. You will start with a broad orientation of multiple weekly tasks but will grow into one that fits your skills and wishes.

assignments.title: Fundamental Research group
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: To realize the decentralized dream with free learning for all, the Koios DAO needs to become self-sustainable. One way to possibly discover this is to engage with partner protocols and exchange value. The assignment is to search & select the suitable protocols and help us find the win-wins. Join our team & resources, and expand your network!

assignments.title: Crypto news
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Are you reading every crypto news article, following every Twitter debate and are you active in many, many different communities? Than this is your moment to shine! Share & summarise your most important readings on a daily basis in the Blackbird Discord. If you are really talented and motivated we can move you towards the World Website and create your own blog there. Content is king!

assignments.title: Community driven value exchange
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: The Koios DAO will be run by the community, facilitated by the Koios token which enables different types of value exchange. The community and types of value exchanges (use-cases) are therefore of the utmost importance. This job is about researching, finding and applying initiatives to grow the community and improve the quality of participation. Multiple angles can be chosen from (token design, use-cases, community quantity or quality improvements). Go all out in creating incentives, experiment with real-life usecases, host (online or offline) activities, and claim your front seat in the Koios community!

assignments.title: Legal – Intellectual Property (platform or curriculum)
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Koios is actively sharing content and the platform is build in open-source fashion. This screams legal intellectual property issues. It would be your job to find the IP bottle necks and propose possible solutions that work for involved (and future) parties. Many examples are out there, how did they solve these legal challenges? We have laid some of the groundworks already, you can take it from there! Your deliverable would be and advice and implementation track.
assignments.typeTitle: This challenge can be executed as:

type.typeItem: Individual or group assignment for study credits & Titan Tokens

assignments.title: Legal – GDPR & Badges
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Before we go live with badges per user, we need to make sure all is GDRP (AVG) proof. Many examples are out there, how did they solve these legal challenges? We have laid some of the groundworks already, you can take it from there! Your deliverable would be and advice and implementation track.

assignments.title: Legal – Koios token sale
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: To realize the decentralized dream with free learning for all, the Koios DAO needs to become self-sustainable. One way to possibly realize this is to raise funds with selling governance tokens. Based on research in the crypto space, your task would be writing an advisory report that suits the needs of the ecosystem and confirms with the legal framework. Many examples are out there, how did they solve these legal challenges? We have laid some of the groundworks already, you can take it from there!

assignments.title: Legal – Koios token sale
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description:
We would love to reward users for tasks or link them to environments with loads of opportunities to apply their skills and reap rewards. Help us explore the realm of micro-challenge, in which we are currently in phase 0 (building from ground): 
Explore the realm of paid micro-challenges and help us select the right environments (for example gitcoin.co)
 Help design the earning page and fill it with assignments and links
Help create incentives for community members and partners to add challenges 
Help create incentives for community members and partners to solve and earn from challenges 
Streamline the process, optimize UX (for micro-payments for example) 
Help promote / tell the story

assignments.description: Content is king and the curriculum crew is core business. Extra benefit: if you want to align your weekly quiz and portfolio activities with your field assignment, this is a good track!

assignments.title: Koios Marketing & Media
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: So far, Koios has operated very low-key. Now is the time to change that. We are looking for a marketing growth manager, somebody familiar with social media and willing to expand the reach in the crypto space. We already laid some of the groundwork, so you can work from our hitlist or bring your own approach and vision to the table. Let the Koios shill begin 😊!

assignments.title: Global inclusive learning
assignments.subTitle: The Koios DAO, in collaboration with The Hague University of Applied Sciences.
assignments.description: Due to the open-source approach, people from all over the world can access the program. So far, we have mainly been focussing on Bachelor students from THUAS. But now is the time to expand to regions less familiar with web3 technology. Your task will be to improve the onboarding process for all kinds of students & discuss the Koios possibilities with entities around the globe.
